reqs:
This is a core course for the Diploma in Education - Teacher-Librarianship.
This is one course for the Certificate in Teacher-Librarianship.
Wait lists are not offered.
courseName: Inquiry-Based Pedagogy in School Library Programs
description: Principles and practices of teachers and teacher-librarians designing and teaching curriculum using inquiry-based pedagogy. LLED 469 is a core course for the Teacher Librarian Diploma.
